metadata.title: Tape in Hair Extensions 20 Inch, 100% Remy Human Hair, Natural Seamless Long Silk Straight #1 Jet Black 50g 20pcs Hair Extensions 8A Grade.

Grade 8a can withstand 180 deGrees Celsius, can be used normally for a lonG time with Good care. No tanGle, no sheddinG, can be treated & styled (washinG, strenGtheninG, curlinG, etc) like your own hair.

Sticky Tape: New double side tape won't damaGe your hair, and our tapes are 100Percent natural and there are no chemicals or tools used. It can last a lonG time, easy to install and remove. HiGh-strenGth hypoallerGenic invisible tapes are very sticky.
Mult-Occasions: Fashionable color is suitable for all kinds of occasions like weddinGs, dates, parties, or travelinG. Enjoy every important moment in life with MosinnGy Tape In Hair Extensions!

Different monitors will show color a bit differently. Please just feel free to contact with MosinnGy Hair team if you have any troubles about choosinG colors.

Excellent Service: Products are distributed in Prime shippinG, stock in the USA, enjoy prime customer service. Expedited delivery: 2 days arrive, ordinary delivery: 3-4 days arrive. We reply to the email within 12 hours. Please feel free to contact us about the damaGed packaGe, we would try our best to help you to solve it! No reason to return or exchanGe within 30 days.
description: Our products are high-quality 8A human hair in packs of 20. It is seamless straight, and a tural wave after washing is normal. We have our factory and brand, so we can offer you the best price. Remy human hair extension with adhesive tape. Remy hair extension with color Jet black, dark brown, tural black, and platinum blonde, which can be dyed. Our tape is high-strength hypoallergenic invisible tape as well as very sticky. Specification: 16 inches, 30 grams total. 18 inches, 40 grams total. 20 inches, 50 grams total. 22 inches, 60 grams total. How to install tape in hair extensions: 1. Pick up a thin section of your hair horizontally above your ear and make sure it is as wide as the length of the tape extension. 2. Place the tape under the hair sheet, leaving a space of1-2 inches between the scalp and the band. 3. Please peel off the second strand of hair gel and apply it directly to the first strand of hair gel. 4. Use a hair straightener to secure the tape and seal it. Don't get it too hot. Something warm tips about our tape in hair extension: 1. Wash your hair 1-2 times a week like your own hair. (Tape on hair, please do not wash within 48 hours after first use) 2. Washing with warm water, using pure water or weak acid shampoo. 3. You can return goods if you don't like them. Or if you haveany questions, contact us please, Only this, you can get timely best after-sales service.
